name: Love Dots Rescue
description:
Use your finger to drag the Blue dot to save the white dots & open up the gate to free the love of your life, Pink dot. Avoid the obstacles while you make your way through the levels. You will have 3 lives to use in order to save the Pink dot. If you cannot save the Pink dot with 3 lives you will need to start all over. This is a fun, challenging, yet relaxing epic adventure game with endless hours of gameplay.

Features:
- 450+ Fun & Challenging Levels
- 3 Modes - Normal, Nightmare & Ultra Nightmare
- 3 Difficulty levels: Circle, Triangle & Square
- Train your brain & save the love of your life
- 100% Free to Play
